name: The Search For Pikakovic
description:
A game based on the hilarious youtube channel youtube.com/Funhaus, taking tons of inside jokes and funny moments from their videos :D This game is super clunky, and involves clues you will find in each map. In this game you search for Adam Kovic's spirit animal: "Pikakovic." Once you find him, you come to a fate-bending choice.
Please send hatemail and or bugs to: rosswalterspam@gmail.com
Follow me on twitter: @rosscoe_3


Listen and download the album :D
